attributes.action: How Can The UK Lead the Way In A Global Effort To Stop War and The Destruction of Life on Earth
attributes.additional_details:
Upon reaching the required signatures Government to discuss;
 The potential of a WW3 and how and what the UK can do to deescalate the situation in Israel and Gaza, Ukraine, America and Russia
 How the UK government expects to ever climb out of the debt its in without creating more debts.
 How can the UK lead the way in a global effort to stop wars.
 How the UK can lead the way in a global effort to become a sustainable planet.
